title: 2017 NA LCS Summer Finals tickets
body: As a certain feathered friend revealed, 2017 NA LCS Summer Finals is heading to Boston on September 2-3. If you’re hoping to join us for Finals weekend to see a new champion be crowned live from the renowned TD Garden, here’s what you need to know to get your tickets:

replies.body: Will we have to buy two tickets for the two days? Or will one ticket cover both days?
Yes, you will need to have a ticket for both days. You will have the option to buy a 2 day ticket at a discount.
Thank you for answering

Hey, Im traveling there with 4 other people, and we want to make sure we get seats near each other. I read that you can only purchase 6 tickets or bundles. Does that mean I can purchase 5 2 day bundles and we will get seated near each other?
Yes, that should work.
Ticketmaster is limiting all seating to 2 tickets for the presale (not just floor seats). Is this intended?

Yea the whole site is glitched. I have video showing what I'm clicking on. My girlfriend at home was on another browser and her page for tickets looks compeltely different and is searchable...mine was either by best seat or cheapest. I chose best seat and went through all seats and everything was glitched. The only thing that works is balcony seats.
Please upload the video and link it to me. I'll investigate
Thanks for the video. Sent it on to Ticket Master to investigate.
Can you send the exact ticket page URL you are receiving this error on? That will make it easier to pinpoint the problem
https://www1.ticketmaster.com/2017-na-league-of-legends-championship-boston-massachusetts/event/010052D6EF0071C0?artistid=2386965&majorcatid=10004&minorcatid=102#efeat4212
Imgur or some other upload site will work best. Thanks.
Should I just upload it to imgur or something where videos can be uploaded?
This is happening to my party as well, and now we have scatterred tickets

So of course now the ticket amount they let you buy has increased from 2 to whatever at this point. I'm sorry that you got screwed by that. I couldn't even get tickets at all because right from the start when I went to choose LOGE 1 or 12 and Row 1 at 12:00 and some odd seconds past the minute....it was glitched. Not sure what good it'll do but I didn't even end up getting tickets. Nothing was working and now it appears all of the pre-sale tickets are gone for those sections (as I'm sure they've locked 'x' amount for pre-sale and the rest for general sale) :( guess I won't go this year.
So now buying more tickets is working, but ive already forked out for scattered seats and cannot refund. I am seriously livid rn. Please help me out here.

This is from 12:04....like I get stuff sells out, but this was glitched for me, right from the get go. 
https://vimeo.com/223166071?ref=em-share
Were you guys able to buy more than 2 tickets? Because I wanted to buy for a part of 6 and it wouldn't let me :/
Is there a venue map available with the price levels? Like the one from "2017 NA LCS Spring Finals Tickets" page?
We are finalizing that with the TD Garden this week and will have it up for the pre-sale

Thank you for answering... One more question.  I live pretty close to Boston and wish to bring my car.  Will there be free parking provided at the stadium area (for those that bought tickets to see the finals)?
Parking won't be free.
Thanks {{item:3070}}
I'm looking at the presale currently, and do not see the stadium floor chart, is this intended? I just see the NA Championship Series logo at the moment.

Hi Natural20. Thank you for helping with the issue that we've been experiencing. I'm a little worried because I have already purchased 2 tickets as have the friends I am going with, all seperated now. Will we be able to refund these tickets and purchase new ones now? I need to know or else we are going either together with bad seats or apart woth presale seats. I am sick to my stomach with anxiety. Please let me know as soon as you can. Thanks a bunch.
-Max
Don't know if you are gonna reply to this, but it says that we can buy up to 6 tickets in one transaction but using the pre-offer code, it only allows us to buy a maximum of 2 tickets.
Same my dude
It was a bug. Should be fixed now

I just tried to buy 6 tickets (I have 5 friends going) to the 2-day bundle. It limited me to 2 per transaction, so I tried to do 3 transactions, but it's saying I've hit my limit. I'm not choosing floor seats, I'm choosing LOGE seats. Is there any fix to this? Only one of my other friends signed up for the early access, so we can only buy 4 total, and they're not next to each other.
I am having the exact same problem, i feel like we got scammed out of sitting together
It was a bug where all limits were set to 2. Should be fixed now.

Can we buy more than 2 tickets during the presale even though I don't want floor seats? I'm going with more than 2 people but TicketMaster isn't allowing more than 2 tickets per transaction for any section.

I'm very excited for this. Been a fan for several years, but live on East Coast (Virginia) and haven't had the stars align correctly to be able to go. My girlfriend who is a fan as well will be joining me and we are planning to go to the finals in Boston. Waiting on pre-sale and all that. Hoping to meet Phreak! Haha :)

I see the seating chart has been released. We want to buy floor seats but I'm googling and seeing mixed reactions. Where would you say the best seats are, not being biased towards the price? I want front row floor, but I don't want to break my neck looking up and I want the best viewing experience.

It really is a matter of personal preference. If you are on the floor you will be closer to the pros and we plan our seating so that no one should have to break their neck. My personal preference is around the top rows of the lower bowl.
Thanks so much! So would Section 1 or 12 be something you'd like? I was looking at floor and thinking front row G or D, but ONLY if I could get that very first row.
I am talking to TM now to see what is going on. Sorry for the glitches

Wow....this has been the worst experience on TicketMaster I've seen. I know it's not you guys, personally, but their site is so glitched, you can't even buy a seat. It says sorry another fan beat you to it, and suggests another row (fine thats fine), but then it just glitches back and forth...over and over. Can't get a seat anywhere. I even picked a section I wouldnt even want to sit in, but did it to test, all glitched.
That poster art is dope.
+1. I'm using it as my desktop now

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Natural20,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=kMfWxAEL,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2017-06-22T20:47:36.433+0000)
>
> +1. I'm using it as my desktop now

I guess you could say you crit your perception check to spot it.
You are my kind of people
I know we can only buy 2 floor seats per transaction, but is there a way to help make sure that parties bigger than that (4 people) can sit together?
Not on the floor. Every other section will have a limit of 6.
how much longer til we get more info on the tickets needed to meet the pros?
Accidentally bought two floor seats for day 1 if anyone is interested.
The 4K wallpaper is amazing

So after my own little analysis...I can sort of see what went wrong here, for me anyway. At 12PM EST I went straight to the Bundle package and tried to get my tickets for section D or G, row 1 or LOGE 1 or 12, row 1...and as the package obviously states, it's for both Saturday and Sunday. Well...it seems MOST people...are only buying tickets for the finals. So while on my end, TicketMaster was trying to 'hold' the tickets for both days, and checking both days, caused a slight delay and those who just wanted the one day got their tickets before me. I can still get LOGE 1 or 12 on Saturday, but like row 7+ (which is fine, but I'd want it for both days) and on Sunday...for pre-sale anyway, literally all of the good tickets are gone. All floor (that are in a reasonable viewing section) and all LOGE 1,12 etc. All that's left are some random LOGE sections that are off center and in corners and balcony. So....that all sucks. My personal recommendation would be to first open the bundle packages in the future, for maybe 1 hour before the rest? That way those who are wanting to go both days...giving you more money...and trying to make the most of their trip to Boston (which for me is a fun 11 hour road trip - I don't mind driving, I think it'd be neat), instead of opening it all and essentially all bundle people got sort of screwed. The TM bundle feature is apparently an "all or nothing" type of system where if you want LOGE 1 Row 2 and it's not available, it'll try one other row, and then that's it. It won't help you book your Saturday tickets and then Sunday tickets. It's one shot or nothing. So I said...well...how about I book Saturday and then book Sunday? Well...you lose the 25% discount because you didn't bundle and the seats are so drastically different it's not even worth the trip. So...lesson learned on my end, lol. I hope others have a better experience and enjoy the show. I don't blame Riot at all for this and blame my own ignorance for buying tickets (my first time) and the terrible TicketMaster website.

Hey all.

Looks like there was a bug that caused everyone to have a ticket limit of 2 regardless of where they wanted seats. We fixed that, so if you have not used your code yet you can go get your 6 seats. If you have already bought 2, we will re issue codes asap.
If we have already purchased how are we being refunded??
